description: This creature can make an attack before and after it moves while flying.

sections.text: When flying, the creature can take a move action and another standard action at any point during the move. The creature cannot take a second move action during a round when it makes a flyby attack.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: Without this feat, the creature takes a standard action either before or after its move.
sections.name: Normal

name: Flyby Attack
